description: [Nightdoor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1147) gathers information on the victim system such as CPU and Computer name as well as device drivers. [Nightdoor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1147) can also collect information about disk drives, their total and free space, and file system type.(Citation: ESET EvasivePanda 2024)

external_references.description: Ahn Ho, Facundo Muñoz, & Marc-Etienne M.Léveillé. (2024, March 7). Evasive Panda leverages Monlam Festival to target Tibetans. Retrieved July 25, 2024.
